io.micronaut.http.codec

Interface MediaTypeCodec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JacksonMediaTypeCodec, JsonMediaTypeCodec, JsonStreamMediaTypeCodec, TextPlainCodec, TextStreamCodec

    public interface MediaTypeCodec
    Represents a codec for a particular media type. For example JSON.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Method Summary
